channel.title: How to run a server with more people then just u?
channel.description:
how to run a server with more people then just myself because i can't just let my pc stay on for ever.
please help

item.title: How to run a server with more people then just u?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

What do you mean?

If people can’t connect and you are using a router; portforward.

If you mean how can you host the server 24/7 and hold a lot of people, buy a VPS.

Read full topic
item.source: How to run a server with more people then just u?
